state_analysis: The attempt to install the 'distutils' package still appears to be failing, as evidenced by the persistent errors related to missing modules when trying to run the training script. This is preventing the installation of other necessary packages like gym and numpy.
explanation: These commands will try to install 'python3-distutils' using an alternative method to ensure that it is successfully installed. Following that, the installation of gym and numpy will be attempted again before executing the training script.

commands.keystrokes: apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3-distutils || apt-get install -y python3-pip
pip uninstall -y numpy gym gymnasium setuptools
